sub_title: Corporate Venturing & Intrapreneurship | Gig & Flex work economy | Startup and Scale Up mentoring | PSP’s | DeFi | Payday Founder | Angel Investor
summary:
Building is what I do best and get energized by. Whether it is building relationships and trust and consequently deals, innovative ideas and products, or alignment and enthusiasm among colleagues. 
I am an authentic entrepreneurial spirit, a quick thinker and a bin full of ideas who excels in identifying opportunities within a complex international environment. Opportunities that I orchestrate in a multiple stake holder environment and bring to the finish line with a can-do-mentality as part of a long-term vision and strategy.  My ability to quickly comprehend complex matter, and make it understandable and insightful for a broader audience has contributed to my successes.

Furthermore my strengths lie in inspiring and enthusing teams and people, challenging sticky patterns and coming up with practical and workable alternatives with an interest in people and their needs. The challenges of life have triggered me to re-invent myself on several occasions over recent years, to come out as a more complete and mature person. 

I perform best in a professional international, dynamic and innovative environment with room for unconventional ideas and change. Currently as a co-founder and venture lead for my own corporate start-up Payday, wich we are currently running through the prove scales phase of the ABN AMRO innovation funnel. 

Personal Style & Competencies:

Unconventional, energetic, relationship builder, team-builder, go-getter,  perseverance, always be closing, entrepreneurial, intelligent

treasury_media.title: ABN AMRO adds Freelancer Wallet app to Payday in pilot with Younited®
Packaly en ABN AMRO lanceren instant payout service voor koeriers
ABN AMRO’s Payday offers unique solution for paying flexi-workers instantly
Direct uitbetalen met Payday | ABN AMRO Doorpakken
treasury_media.description: Gig-workers die lang moeten wachten op loon is dankzij Payday verleden tijd. Betaal ZZP'ers, freelancers, flexwerkers en uitzendkrachten direct uit.

treasury_media.title: ABN AMRO and Charly Cares launch pilot for instant payments for gig-workers
treasury_media.description:
In January, with a blank sheet of paper, we were asked to start looking at the gig-worker economy. Today, after 9 months of exploring, problem validation and building a solution along the ABN AMRO DARE innovation methodology, our corporate venture announces the pilot with Charly Cares, where we provide instant access to earnings for gig-workers.
Very proud of the ABN AMRO & Charly Cares teams, and grateful for lot's of fun and a great learning experience in my role as Corporate Intrapreneur!

profile_positions.description:
The TechStars partnership gives me an amazing opportunity to share and learn:

Share my extensive network in corporate & finance, as well as the in-depth knowledge of a wealth of industries. 
Learn from all the amazing ideas that sometimes just blow your mind and catapult you far outside your comfort zone. It also gave great ideas for potential partnerships and angel investments.
 
Focus area’s: Fintech & gig-economy
profile_positions.title: Startup Mentor

profile_positions.description:
Following a mentorship for the ABN AMRO + Techstars Future of Finance Accelerator, it is an honor to pick up a role as an informal board member for this amazing young and promising startup.

TOKEN POWERED LOYALTY IN ANY APP OR WEBSITE
Boost engagement and create new revenue streams. Powered by a battle tested loyalty API and the Polygon blockchain.

Engage your audience as easy as 1-2-3, embed a small piece of code and immediately launch your loyalty points and perks such as NFTs. Using the widget or SDK you save months of work compared to starting from scratch.

To see the loyalty widget in action (example): https://tryhards.io/
profile_positions.title: Informal Board Member

profile_positions.description: Founded in 2010, Startupbootcamp is one of the most successful global innovation programs, supporting top companies across the world through over 20 offices in key global hubs. Startupbootcamp has a proven mentor-driven and industry-focused model of supporting innovative companies that has resulted in 70% of program graduates still active and 64% having raised additional funding from many of the world’s leading VCs and angels
profile_positions.title: Startup Mentor

profile_positions.description:
Payday is a corporate start-up build from a blank piece of paper through prove problem, prove solution and prove pay in the ABN AMRO corporate start-ups funnel, currently in prove scales. 
We are providing labour platforms with the tools to make flex workers earnings available instantly after work done 24/7. This includes an API integration, access to our instant payment engine, our home build dedicated front-end wallet app and the working capital to facilitate this.

We've build a from a 2 cowboys founding team to currently a 15+FTE rebel team running an actual business, with actual revenues and clients. The team includes product owners, developers, UX design & validation, scrum master, finance, operations & sales. We currently pay 20k+ freelancers with their earnings instantly, making 2000+ payments a day. 

We provide platforms, temp agencies, or for that matter any corporate with a large flex worker layer, with the opportunity to provide a superior worker experience, leading to an increased NPS score, higher activity level and an extended life time on the platform. 

After running pilots with various platforms, including Charly Cares, Packaly, YoungOnes, Level.Works, RGF Staffing, 365Werk and others, we have obtained formal product approval, marking the completion of the innovation phase and exit towards the mother ship into business as usual.

The Payday journey however will continue! We have a fantastic team that will migrate Payday towards the main bank and further grow and develop the proposition until Payday has become the game changer and new standard for handling earnings in the flex work economy.
profile_positions.title: Payday Founder & Venture lead - Instant access to earnings!

profile_positions.description:
"Intrapreneurship is the act of behaving like an Entrepreneur, but within an established organisation" - Gifford Pinchot III

The intrapreneur program is aimed at ABN AMRO colleagues with an entrepreneurial mindset who are searching for and developing new revenue-generating business models. They accelerate disruptive innovation and build a diversified portfolio of disruptive innovation initiatives. 

Precisely because as innovators we are not satisfied with the status quo, we want challenge existing definitions of what it means to be a bank.

Digital platforms are transforming society and are quickly becoming the dominant business model across most industries. Meanwhile, the twin forces of digitalisation and regulation are forcing businesses to change in fundamental ways. 

By not just acknowledging but embracing the power of platform business models and new technologies, we see a huge opportunity to deliver a superior experience to customers and thereby to grow ourselves in a sustainable way by doing business in a more open manner and by playing new, enabling roles in ecosystems – at scale.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Intrapreneur - Digital Platforms - Group Innovation

profile_positions.description:
The TechStars partnership gives me an amazing opportunity to share and learn:

Share my extensive network in corporate & finance, as well as the in depth knowledge of a wealth of industries. 
Learn from all the amazing ideas that sometimes just blow your mind and catapult you far outside your comfort zone. It also gave great ideas for potential partnerships and Value added Services to add to the Payday proposition.
 
The Amsterdam accelerator (in conjunction with ABN Amro) is an annual programme focussed on FinTech. 

TechStars is an American seed accelerator founded in Boulder, Colorado. As of 2019, the company had accepted over 1,600 companies into its programmes with a combined market capitalisation of $18.
profile_positions.title: Startup Mentor ABN AMRO & Techstars Future of Finance Accelerator

profile_positions.description:
Globally responsible for the overall relationship & business development with large banks in the region and pan-European Consumer Finance players. This involves sustaining commercial dialogue and developing new business models & revenue streams.  Over the past years I have successfully built new pockets of business and met my annual turnover target and all compliance & regulatory requirements. I manage the C-level dialogue and lead multiple multidisciplinary international deal teams. They appreciate my guidance, enthusiasm and perseverance. 

Recent successes include the CaixaBank Social Bond, Sustainability Advisory proposition, a broad range of Dutch cash management mandates, Tikkie for business, the Consumer Finance Round Table on PSD & Open Banking, the EUR 13 bn. Unicredit Rights Issue, EUR 650mio. PSA Spanish Auto ABS and 100+mio. lending transactions for a.o. Santander, Credit Agricole Consumer Finance and FCA Bank.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director - Head of banks Western & Southern Europe - Consumer Finance Sector specialist

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the global relationship of ABN AMRO with banks in Southern, Central & Eastern Europe & Latin America. After the breakup of ABN AMRO we traveled almost every corner of the planet with a small team to secure relations with our international clients, that had been acquired by RBS This resulted in a strong international network of corresponding banks. We managed to retain relations with over 100 international banks. Appointed team head June 2011
profile_positions.title: Director, Senior Relationship Manager International Bank Relations

profile_positions.description: Within Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS), I was responsible for a portfolio of  large Dutch Wholesale Clients, amongst which Ahold, Heineken and private equity owned Dutch retailers Maxeda and Hema. I was directly in charge of commercial and strategic dialogue in cooperation with multiple deal teams with responsibility for annual revenues around EUR 30mio. Major transactions included the sale of Hema to Lion Capital, the Leveraged Finance deals for Hema & Maxeda and PIN and European cash mgt mandates for Ahold.
profile_positions.title: Relationship banker

profile_positions.description: Role equal to the following one at RBS
profile_positions.title: Director, Relationship Banker for Wholesale Consumer, Retail and Industrial Clients

profile_positions.description: Top Tier wholesale clients. My focus was on dealing room treasury, sales and advisory. I handled a portfolio of the 12 largest blue chip clients of ABN AMRO. I also coached junior employees, inspiring them to find and take their position within the team
profile_positions.title: Director, Corporate Sales Risk Advisor Dealingroom

profile_positions.description: Advisory on FX, interest rate and commodity risk for large corporate clients
profile_positions.title: Several roles focused on Dealingroom sales & advisory
